page.title: 17 JOBS OF STRATFORD POLICE
page.content: ROTHER STREET POLICE STATION SERVES AN AREA OF 300 SQUARE MILES AROUND STRAT- FORD.FOOT PATROLLING POLICEMEN ARE ONLY SENT OUT INTO STRATFORD TOWN CENTRE TO DEAL WITH SHOP LIFTING AND TO PROVIDE THE TOWN WITH A SENSE OF SECURITY. THE MOST SERIOUS RECENT CRIMES IN THIS AREA SEEM TO BE BREAK-IN ROBBERIES. TOURISM DOES NOT NECESSARILY ATTRACT MORE CRIME BUT IT AFFECTS THE TYPE OF CRIME COMMITTED EG.THEFT ARISING FROM UNATTENDED CARS AND HOTEL ROOMS. MOST OF THE CAR ACCIDENTS IN THIS AREA OCCUR ON THE CONGESTED EVESHAM ROAD AND THERE ARE TRAFFIC PROBLEMS WHENEVER THERE IS A RACE AT STRATFORD RACECOURSE POLICEMEN FROM THE STRATFORD STATION HAVE BEEN CALLED OUT TO TREAT SICK PIGEONS AND FISH AND HAVE EVEN FED DUCKS TO PREVENT THEIR DEATHS DURING THE COLD WINTERS!
